divs: sighting detailsim observed in the sky...an object floatind towards me ......everynight since this date there r numerous objects movin slowly in the sky and several posted in the sky movin very seldemly around and a couple bright white lighted ones ....... most have blue lights ..i also observed and bright red\orange silver ball shaped spinning in the same spot 4 15 seconds above freeway 470 at 103rd and wornall several days later seeing a silver ball shaped object flyin around like crazy very high speeds....during the day everynight they r out here in the sky ive noticed ever since once dawn hits........2 months later i observed a very large object spaceship with white lights in the middle back top of the object with 1 red light in the back...and never even heard it or made any sounds whatoever around 330 am and took off and dissapeared in a matter of seconds looking north it took off goin northwestit was extremely low at the time i seen it........every single night since i decided 2 pay more attention 2 the sky tere out here ever since my 1st sight....i see strange very fast blinking white lights traveling very fast speeds across the skies at night and some r just streaks of light and dissapear some r white with red lights most r blue and i observed the same night seeing the very large ship 100 + objects moving around i wasnt on anything and wasnt intoxicated as crazy as all this sounds but its real and very real both my parents admitted 2 seeing ufo's back in the 40's and 70's what im seeing occurs nightly and everynight ever since i seen the conspiracy theory show is how i got your guy's website ...i also called the police the night i started seeing the objects and they patted me down like i was crazy and kept askin me stupid questions like i didnt have all my marbles i take this very serious and know what ive seen and see have a great day
Summary: multiple unidentified objects shaped as cylinders most with lights some without
